5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Laila said:“I prayed beside the Prophet (ﷺ) when he was praying voluntary prayers at night. He recited a Verse which mentioned punishment and said: ‘I seek refuge with Allah from the Fire, woe to the people of the Fire.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي صَلاَةِ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning recitation in the (voluntary) night Prayers
